Blockchain.name: The Quantum Resistant Ledger - QRL
Blockchain.description: The QRL digital asset is secure against current and emerging cryptographic threats. Our suite of solutions provide a range of options for the safe custody of QRL digital assets and interaction with public and private post-quantum secure blockchains built on our core protocol.

Industrial Services.name: Siemnons - PoQsiKom
Industrial Services.description: The PoQsiKom project is developing one of the essential foundations for enabling the long-term secure, sovereign and efficient networking of operating technology in Industry 4.0 and thus ensuring a high level of interoperability.

Messaging.name: Apple iMessage
Messaging.description: iMessage with PQ3: The new state of the art in quantum-secure messaging at scale

Messaging.name: Signal
Messaging.description: Quantum Resistance and the Signal Protocol

Net Services.name: digicert
Net Services.description: Weathering the transition to a quantum safe posture will require organizations to adapt and scale the way they manage digital certificates. At the same time, they will need to migrate their cryptography to approved quantum safe algorithms – potentially multiple times as the standards evolve. It is critical to develop now the ability to continuously discover and manage certificates at-scale.

Net Services.name: OpenSSH
Net Services.description: OpenSSH 9.0 using the hybrid Streamlined NTRU Prime + x25519 key exchange method by default

Post Quantum Resources.name: IBM Quantum-safe software solutions
Post Quantum Resources.description: IBM Quantum Safe™ technology is a comprehensive set of tools, capabilities, and approaches for securing your enterprise for the quantum future.

Post Quantum Resources.description: software for the transition to quantum-resistant cryptography.

Post Quantum Resources.description: Drive the advancement and adoption of post-quantum cryptography.
